name: Legends of Amberland II: The Song of Trees
name_original: Legends of Amberland II: The Song of Trees
description: The Legends of Amberland titles can be played in any order you wish. They share the same world and lore (historical events) but each has a separate and self-contained story. There might be some mild references to events in the previous titles of the series, but more like a flavor, so it does not hinder the ability to play those in any order.
